headline: Ingersoll Rand Accelerates Value Creation Through Continued M&A, Announces New Acquisition
summary: Continues the company’s disciplined capital allocation strategy of targeted bolt-on acquisitions and proven ability to build trusted, proprietary partnerships with family-owned businessesAcquisition expands Ingersoll Rand competencies and capabilities in high-growth end marketsPurchase made at an attractive low-double-digit multiple with expected post-synergy multiple in the mid-to-high single digits DAVIDSON, N.C., July 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Ingersoll Rand Inc., (NYSE: IR) a global provi
